attributes.background: Stop the Government imposing a second lockdown. A new general election with a party who will let the economy flourish and those in the risk zone shield themselves.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Do not implement a second national lockdown or other restrictions this winter: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549862

Repeal second National Lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557045

Hold an immediate general election: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557074
